feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.4.1
entry.content: • Remove PLEX.one stuff, sticking with just github

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.4.2
entry.content: • Added season packs mode and shows modes for sonarr upgrades

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.4.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added Season Packs Upgrade Mode for Sonarr.

  • Fixes01 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/376
  • Cap30 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/386
  • Beta by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/387
  • Beta by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/392
  • feat: add configurable upgrade mode for Sonarr quality upgrades by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/400
  • S002 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/403 Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.3.2...6.4.3

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.4.4
entry.content:
Resolves:

https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/398 about log spam and did some additional stuff

  • If users put a / at the end of the url or any special characters, a script removes it and saves the proper address to prevent issues (usually with sonarr)

  • moved to debug (the 30 second intervals)

  • moved to debug (was spamming in info constantly, but if there is an error, it will show in info)

  • removed this from initial load up since it didn't work an not needed

Fixed issue of the information icon display - removed from mobile and desktop view

What's Changed

  • Fix011 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/408
  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/409

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.4.3...6.4.4

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.4.5
entry.content:
Fixes major bug with state management. Even though it was coded, it did not run in the background process; thus the state management will never reset (unless you press that emergency button). This fix ensures that background.py runs the reset so your stuff can start processing again.

https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/407 - GITHUB Issue

Also a new scheduling tab is added, but. not working yet (noted with a warning under development)
